languages.text: {n}Глубоко вздохнув, контрабандистка веско произносит:{/n} "Вы не мешали Фалько грабить меня. Не мешали ему убивать моих близких. Круг голосовал за мое устранение? Насколько мне известно, нет. Либо признайте, что позволяли ему нарушать правила, либо сделаем вид, что они все еще важны. По правилам Фалько был самоуправцем, а я его наказала... допустим, от вашего лица. И его Торг — мой трофей и вознаграждение от круга за беспокойство".

{n}Jae takes a deep breath and with compelling seriousness, says,{/n} "You did not stop Falco from robbing me. You did not stop him from killing my friends. Has the circle voted for my removal? Not as far as I know. Either you admit that you allowed Falco to break the rules, or you have to act like they still matter. According to the rules, Falco was out of line, and I punished him... on your behalf, let's say. So his Trade is my trophy and the circle's reward for my trouble."
languages.original_text: {n}Глубоко вздохнув, контрабандистка веско произносит:{/n} "Вы не мешали Фалько грабить меня. Не мешали ему убивать моих близких. Круг голосовал за мое устранение? Насколько мне известно, нет. Либо признайте, что позволяли ему нарушать правила, либо сделаем вид, что они все еще важны. По правилам Фалько был самоуправцем, а я его наказала... допустим, от вашего лица. И его Торг — мой трофей и вознаграждение от круга за беспокойство".

languages.text: {n}婕伊深吸一口气，以无比严肃的语气开了口。{/n}“法尔科夺走我的财产时，你没有阻止。法尔科杀害我的朋友时，你也没有阻止。组织高层里投过票，说要把我踢出高层的圈子吗？据我所知，没有。因此，要么你承认，是你允许法尔科违反规则，要么就继续摆出那副规矩至上的样子吧。从规矩上来看，是法尔科先坏了规矩，而我……这么说吧，我代表你惩罚了他。因此，他的生意是我的战利品，也是组织高层对我的奖赏。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae takes a deep breath and with compelling seriousness, says,{/n} "You did not stop Falco from robbing me. You did not stop him from killing my friends. Has the circle voted for my removal? Not as far as I know. Either you admit that you allowed Falco to break the rules, or you have to act like they still matter. According to the rules, Falco was out of line, and I punished him... on your behalf, let's say. So his Trade is my trophy and the circle's reward for my trouble."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊深吸一口气，以无比严肃的语气开了口。{/n}“法尔科夺走我的财产时，你没有阻止。法尔科杀害我的朋友时，你也没有阻止。组织高层里投过票，说要把我踢出高层的圈子吗？据我所知，没有。因此，要么你承认，是你允许法尔科违反规则，要么就继续摆出那副规矩至上的样子吧。从规矩上来看，是法尔科先坏了规矩，而我……这么说吧，我代表你惩罚了他。因此，他的生意是我的战利品，也是组织高层对我的奖赏。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは深呼吸をし、真剣な表情でこう言った。{/n}「あんたはファルコがあたしの友人を殺すのを止めなかった。会合はあたしの解任に賛成したの？あたしの知る限り、そんなことはないでしょう。あんたらにできるのは、ファルコがルールを破るのを許したことを認めるか、ルールがまだ重要であるかのように振る舞うかのどちらかさ。ルールに則れば、ファルコのやったことは常軌を逸していた。だからあたしは彼に罰を与えた…あんたらの代わりにね。だから彼の交易はあたしの戦利品であり、会合があたしに与えるべき代価のはずだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae takes a deep breath and with compelling seriousness, says,{/n} "You did not stop Falco from robbing me. You did not stop him from killing my friends. Has the circle voted for my removal? Not as far as I know. Either you admit that you allowed Falco to break the rules, or you have to act like they still matter. According to the rules, Falco was out of line, and I punished him... on your behalf, let's say. So his Trade is my trophy and the circle's reward for my trouble."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは深呼吸をし、真剣な表情でこう言った。{/n}「あんたはファルコがあたしの友人を殺すのを止めなかった。会合はあたしの解任に賛成したの？あたしの知る限り、そんなことはないでしょう。あんたらにできるのは、ファルコがルールを破るのを許したことを認めるか、ルールがまだ重要であるかのように振る舞うかのどちらかさ。ルールに則れば、ファルコのやったことは常軌を逸していた。だからあたしは彼に罰を与えた…あんたらの代わりにね。だから彼の交易はあたしの戦利品であり、会合があたしに与えるべき代価のはずだ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae coge aire y declara solemnemente:{/n} «No evitasteis que Falco me robara. No evitasteis que matara a mis amigos. ¿Acaso el círculo ha votado para que se me releve del cargo? No me consta. Así que o admitís que permitisteis que Falco rompiera las reglas o tenéis que fingir que siguen importando. Según esas reglas, Falco se extralimitó y yo le castigué... en vuestro nombre, si queréis. Por eso su comercio es mi trofeo y la recompensa que el círculo me otorga por las molestias».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae takes a deep breath and with compelling seriousness, says,{/n} "You did not stop Falco from robbing me. You did not stop him from killing my friends. Has the circle voted for my removal? Not as far as I know. Either you admit that you allowed Falco to break the rules, or you have to act like they still matter. According to the rules, Falco was out of line, and I punished him... on your behalf, let's say. So his Trade is my trophy and the circle's reward for my trouble."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae coge aire y declara solemnemente:{/n} «No evitasteis que Falco me robara. No evitasteis que matara a mis amigos. ¿Acaso el círculo ha votado para que se me releve del cargo? No me consta. Así que o admitís que permitisteis que Falco rompiera las reglas o tenéis que fingir que siguen importando. Según esas reglas, Falco se extralimitó y yo le castigué... en vuestro nombre, si queréis. Por eso su comercio es mi trofeo y la recompensa que el círculo me otorga por las molestias».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae prend une profonde inspiration, avant de déclarer sur un ton aussi convaincant que sérieux :{/n} « Vous n'avez pas empêché Falco de me voler. Vous ne l'avez pas empêché de tuer mes amis. Le cercle a-t-il voté mon exclusion ? Pas que je le sache. Soit vous admettez avoir autorisé Falco à enfreindre les règles, soit vous faites semblant que leur respect prime encore. D'après ces mêmes règles, Falco n'aurait pas dû agir comme il l'a fait, et je l'ai puni... en votre nom, dirons-nous. Alors je vais considérer son commerce comme mon trophée et comme la récompense du cercle en compensation de mes efforts. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae takes a deep breath and with compelling seriousness, says,{/n} "You did not stop Falco from robbing me. You did not stop him from killing my friends. Has the circle voted for my removal? Not as far as I know. Either you admit that you allowed Falco to break the rules, or you have to act like they still matter. According to the rules, Falco was out of line, and I punished him... on your behalf, let's say. So his Trade is my trophy and the circle's reward for my trouble."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae prend une profonde inspiration, avant de déclarer sur un ton aussi convaincant que sérieux :{/n} « Vous n'avez pas empêché Falco de me voler. Vous ne l'avez pas empêché de tuer mes amis. Le cercle a-t-il voté mon exclusion ? Pas que je le sache. Soit vous admettez avoir autorisé Falco à enfreindre les règles, soit vous faites semblant que leur respect prime encore. D'après ces mêmes règles, Falco n'aurait pas dû agir comme il l'a fait, et je l'ai puni... en votre nom, dirons-nous. Alors je vais considérer son commerce comme mon trophée et comme la récompense du cercle en compensation de mes efforts. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae atmet tief ein und sagt mit großer Ernsthaftigkeit:{/n} "Ihr habt nicht verhindert, dass Falco mich ausraubt. Ihr habt ihn nicht davon abgehalten, meine Freunde zu töten. Hat der Kreis etwa zugestimmt, mich loszuwerden? Soweit ich weiß nicht. Entweder gebt Ihr zu, dass Ihr Falcos Regelbruch zugelassen habt, oder Ihr gebt nur vor, dass die Regeln noch gelten würden. Laut den Regeln ging Falco entschieden zu weit und dafür bestrafte ich ihn ... sozusagen in Eurem Namen. Seine Geschäfte sind dementsprechend meine Trophäe und die Belohnung vom Kreis für meine Unannehmlichkeiten."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae takes a deep breath and with compelling seriousness, says,{/n} "You did not stop Falco from robbing me. You did not stop him from killing my friends. Has the circle voted for my removal? Not as far as I know. Either you admit that you allowed Falco to break the rules, or you have to act like they still matter. According to the rules, Falco was out of line, and I punished him... on your behalf, let's say. So his Trade is my trophy and the circle's reward for my trouble."

Hat der Kreis etwa zugestimmt, mich loszuwerden? Soweit ich weiß nicht. Entweder gebt Ihr zu, dass Ihr Falcos Regelbruch zugelassen habt, oder Ihr gebt nur vor, dass die Regeln noch gelten würden. Laut den Regeln ging Falco entschieden zu weit und dafür bestrafte ich ihn ... sozusagen in Eurem Namen. Seine Geschäfte sind dementsprechend meine Trophäe und die Belohnung vom Kreis für meine Unannehmlichkeiten."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, derin bir nefes alıp çetin bir ciddiyetle konuşuyor.{/n} "Falco'nun beni soymasını engellemedin. Arkadaşlarımı öldürmesini engellemedin. Grup, oy birliğiyle benim saf dışı bırakılmama mı karar verdi? Bildiğim kadarıyla hayır. Ya Falco'nun kuralları ihlal ettiğini kabul ediyorsun ya da bu kurallar hâlâ önemliymiş rolü yapıyorsun. Kurallara göre Falco haddini aştı ve ben de onu cezalandırdım. Senin yerine diyebiliriz. Dolayısıyla onun Ticareti benim ganimetimdir ve grubun, başıma gelen bu dertler sebebiyle bana armağanı olmalıdır."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae takes a deep breath and with compelling seriousness, says,{/n} "You did not stop Falco from robbing me. You did not stop him from killing my friends. Has the circle voted for my removal? Not as far as I know. Either you admit that you allowed Falco to break the rules, or you have to act like they still matter. According to the rules, Falco was out of line, and I punished him... on your behalf, let's say. So his Trade is my trophy and the circle's reward for my trouble."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae derin bir nefes alıyor ve çetin bir ciddiyetle konuşuyor:{/n} "Falco'nun beni soymasını engellemedin. Arkadaşlarımı öldürmesini engellemedin. Grup, oy birliğiyle benim saf dışı bırakılmama mı karar verdi? Bildiğim kadarıyla hayır. Ya Falco'nun kuralları ihlal ettiğini kabul ediyorsun veyahut da bu kurallar hâlâ önemliymiş rolü yapıyorsun. Kurallara göre Falco haddini aştı ve ben de onu cezalandırdım. Senin yerine diyebiliriz. Dolayısıyla onun Ticaret'i benim ganimetimdir ve grubun, başıma gelen bu dertler sebebiyle bana armağanı olmalıdır."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
